 14#define VSIP_OPT_SIGNAL_CONV_EXT_HPP

 18#endif

 25#include <vsip/domain.hpp>
 26#include <vsip/vector.hpp>

 35/***********************************************************************
 36  Declarations
 37***********************************************************************/
 38
 39namespace vsip
 40{
 41namespace impl
 42{
 43
 44template <template <typename, typename> class ConstViewT,
 45	  symmetry_type                       Symm,
 46	  support_region_type                 Supp,
 47	  typename                            T,
 48	  unsigned                            n_times,
 49          alg_hint_type                       a_hint>
 50class Convolution
 51{
 52  static dimension_type const dim = Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim;
 53
 54  // Compile-time constants.
 55public:
 56  static symmetry_type const       symmtry = Symm;
 57  static support_region_type const supprt  = Supp;
 58
 59  // Constructors, copies, assignments, and destructors.
 60public:
 61  template <typename Block>
 62  Convolution(ConstViewT<T, Block> filter_coeffs,
 63              Domain<dim> const&   input_size,
 64              length_type          decimation)
 65    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 66  : coeff_      (conv_kernel<coeff_view_type>(Symm, filter_coeffs)),
 67    coeff_ext_  (coeff_.block(), SYNC_IN),
 68    pcoeff_     (coeff_ext_.data()),
 69    kernel_size_(view_domain(coeff_)),
 70    input_size_ (input_size),
 71    output_size_(conv_output_size(Supp, kernel_size_, input_size,
 72                                  decimation)),
 73    in_buffer_(input_size_.size()),
 74    out_buffer_(output_size_.size()),
 75    tmp_buffer_(input_size_.size() + kernel_size_.size() - 1),
 76    decimation_ (decimation),
 77    pm_non_opt_calls_ (0)
 78  {}
 79  Convolution(Convolution const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 80  Convolution& operator=(Convolution const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 81  ~Convolution() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 82
 83  // Accessors.
 84public:
 85  Domain<dim> const& kernel_size() const VSIP_NOTHROW  { return kernel_size_; }
 86  Domain<dim> const& filter_order() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return kernel_size_; }
 87  Domain<dim> const& input_size() const VSIP_NOTHROW   { return input_size_; }
 88  Domain<dim> const& output_size() const VSIP_NOTHROW  { return output_size_; }
 89  symmetry_type symmetry() const VSIP_NOTHROW          { return Symm; }
 90  support_region_type support() const VSIP_NOTHROW     { return Supp; }
 91  length_type decimation() const VSIP_NOTHROW          { return decimation_; }
 92
 93  float impl_performance(char const *what) const
 94  {
 95    if (!strcmp(what, "in_ext_cost"))        return pm_in_ext_cost_;
 96    else if (!strcmp(what, "out_ext_cost"))  return pm_out_ext_cost_;
 97    else if (!strcmp(what, "non-opt-calls")) return pm_non_opt_calls_;
 98    else return 0.f;
 99  }
100
101  // Implementation functions.
102protected:
103  template <typename Block0,
104	    typename Block1>
105  void
106  convolve(const_Vector<T, Block0>,
107	   Vector<T, Block1>)
108    VSIP_NOTHROW;
109
110  template <typename Block0,
111	    typename Block1>
112  void
113  convolve(const_Matrix<T, Block0>,
114	   Matrix<T, Block1>)
115    VSIP_NOTHROW;
116
117  typedef Layout<dim, typename Row_major<dim>::type,
118                 Stride_unit,
119                 Cmplx_inter_fmt>
120    layout_type;
121  typedef typename View_of_dim<dim, T, Dense<dim, T> >::type coeff_view_type;
122  typedef Ext_data<typename coeff_view_type::block_type, layout_type>
123    c_ext_type;
124
125  // Member data.
126private:
127  coeff_view_type coeff_;
128  c_ext_type      coeff_ext_;
129  T*              pcoeff_;
130
131  Domain<dim>     kernel_size_;
132  Domain<dim>     input_size_;
133  Domain<dim>     output_size_;
134
135  aligned_array<T> in_buffer_;
136  aligned_array<T> out_buffer_;
137  aligned_array<T> tmp_buffer_;
138  length_type     decimation_;
139
140  int             pm_non_opt_calls_;
141  size_t          pm_in_ext_cost_;
142  size_t          pm_out_ext_cost_;
143};
144
145
146
147/***********************************************************************
148  Definitions
149***********************************************************************/
150
151// Perform 1-D convolution.
152
153template <template <typename, typename> class ConstViewT,
154	  symmetry_type       Symm,
155	  support_region_type Supp,
156	  typename            T,
157	  unsigned            n_times,
158          alg_hint_type       a_hint>
159template <typename Block0,
160	  typename Block1>
161void
162Convolution<ConstViewT, Symm, Supp, T, n_times, a_hint>::
163convolve(
164  const_Vector<T, Block0> in,
165  Vector<T, Block1>       out)
166VSIP_NOTHROW
167{
168  using vsip::impl::Any_type;
169
170  length_type const M = this->coeff_.size(0);
171  length_type const N = this->input_size_[0].size();
172  length_type const P = this->output_size_[0].size();
173
174  assert(P == out.size());
175
176  typedef typename Block_layout<Block0>::layout_type LP0;
177  typedef typename Block_layout<Block1>::layout_type LP1;
178
179  typedef Layout<1, Any_type, Any_type, Cmplx_inter_fmt> req_LP;
180
181  typedef typename Adjust_layout<T, req_LP, LP0>::type use_LP0;
182  typedef typename Adjust_layout<T, req_LP, LP1>::type use_LP1;
183
184  typedef Ext_data_dist<Block0, SYNC_IN,  use_LP0>  in_ext_type;
185  typedef Ext_data_dist<Block1, SYNC_OUT, use_LP1> out_ext_type;
186
187  in_ext_type  in_ext (in.block(),  in_buffer_.get());
188  out_ext_type out_ext(out.block(), out_buffer_.get());
189
190  VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE(pm_in_ext_cost_  += in_ext.cost());
191  VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE(pm_out_ext_cost_ += out_ext.cost());
192
193  T* pin    = in_ext.data();
194  T* pout   = out_ext.data();
195
196  stride_type s_in  = in_ext.stride(0);
197  stride_type s_out = out_ext.stride(0);
198
199  if (Supp == support_full)
200  {
201    conv_full<T>(pcoeff_, M, pin, N, s_in, pout, P, s_out, decimation_);
202  }
203  else if (Supp == support_same)
204  {
205    conv_same<T>(pcoeff_, M, pin, N, s_in, pout, P, s_out, decimation_);
206  }
207  else // (Supp == support_min)
208  {
209    conv_min<T>(pcoeff_, M, pin, N, s_in, pout, P, s_out, decimation_);
210  }
211}
212
213
214
215// Perform 2-D convolution.
216
217template <template <typename, typename> class ConstViewT,
218	  symmetry_type          Symm,
219	  support_region_type    Supp,
220	  typename               T,
221	  unsigned               n_times,
222          alg_hint_type          a_hint>
223template <typename Block0,
224	  typename Block1>
225void
226Convolution<ConstViewT, Symm, Supp, T, n_times, a_hint>::
227convolve(
228  const_Matrix<T, Block0> in,
229  Matrix<T, Block1>       out)
230VSIP_NOTHROW
231{
232  using vsip::impl::Any_type;
233
234  // PROFILE: Warn if arguments are not entirely on single processor
235  // (either as undistributed views or as local views of distr obj).
236
237  length_type const Mr = this->coeff_.size(0);
238  length_type const Mc = this->coeff_.size(1);
239
240  length_type const Nr = this->input_size_[0].size();
241  length_type const Nc = this->input_size_[1].size();
242
243  length_type const Pr = this->output_size_[0].size();
244  length_type const Pc = this->output_size_[1].size();
245
246  assert(Pr == out.size(0) && Pc == out.size(1));
247
248  typedef typename Block_layout<Block0>::layout_type LP0;
249  typedef typename Block_layout<Block1>::layout_type LP1;
250
251  typedef Layout<2, Any_type, Any_type, Cmplx_inter_fmt> req_LP;
252
253  typedef typename Adjust_layout<T, req_LP, LP0>::type use_LP0;
254  typedef typename Adjust_layout<T, req_LP, LP1>::type use_LP1;
255
256  typedef Ext_data_dist<Block0, SYNC_IN,  use_LP0>  in_ext_type;
257  typedef Ext_data_dist<Block1, SYNC_OUT, use_LP1> out_ext_type;
258
259  in_ext_type  in_ext (in.block(),  in_buffer_.get());
260  out_ext_type out_ext(out.block(), out_buffer_.get());
261
262  VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE(pm_in_ext_cost_  += in_ext.cost());
263  VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE(pm_out_ext_cost_ += out_ext.cost());
264
265  T* pin    = in_ext.data();
266  T* pout   = out_ext.data();
267
268  stride_type coeff_row_stride = coeff_ext_.stride(0);
269  stride_type coeff_col_stride = coeff_ext_.stride(1);
270  stride_type in_row_stride    = in_ext.stride(0);
271  stride_type in_col_stride    = in_ext.stride(1);
272  stride_type out_row_stride   = out_ext.stride(0);
273  stride_type out_col_stride   = out_ext.stride(1);
274
275  if (Supp == support_full)
276  {
277    conv_full<T>(pcoeff_, Mr, Mc, coeff_row_stride, coeff_col_stride,
278		 pin, Nr, Nc, in_row_stride, in_col_stride,
279		 pout, Pr, Pc, out_row_stride, out_col_stride,
280		 decimation_);
281  }
282  else if (Supp == support_same)
283  {
284    conv_same<T>(pcoeff_, Mr, Mc, coeff_row_stride, coeff_col_stride,
285		 pin, Nr, Nc, in_row_stride, in_col_stride,
286		 pout, Pr, Pc, out_row_stride, out_col_stride,
287		 decimation_);
288  }
289  else // (Supp == support_min)
290  {
291    conv_min<T>(pcoeff_, Mr, Mc, coeff_row_stride, coeff_col_stride,
292		pin, Nr, Nc, in_row_stride, in_col_stride,
293		pout, Pr, Pc, out_row_stride, out_col_stride,
294		decimation_);
295  }
296}
297
298} // namespace vsip::impl
299} // namespace vsip
300
301namespace vsip_csl
302{
303namespace dispatcher
304{
305template <symmetry_type       S,
306	  support_region_type R,
307          typename            T,
308	  unsigned            N,
309          alg_hint_type       H>
310struct Evaluator<op::conv<1, S, R, T, N, H>, be::generic>
311{
312  static bool const ct_valid = true;
313  typedef impl::Convolution<const_Vector, S, R, T, N, H> backend_type;
314};
315template <symmetry_type       S,
316	  support_region_type R,
317          typename            T,
318	  unsigned            N,
319          alg_hint_type       H>
320struct Evaluator<op::conv<2, S, R, T, N, H>, be::generic>
321{
322  static bool const ct_valid = true;
323  typedef impl::Convolution<const_Matrix, S, R, T, N, H> backend_type;
324};
325} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
326} // namespace vsip_csl
